short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bumps all your Dota 2 Lounge trades automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension bumps all your Dota 2 Lounge trades automatically every 30 minutes. Every half hour it discretely opens a tab at dota2lounge.com/mytrades, "clicks" every Bump button, and closes the tab. You DO NOT need to enter your steam password or username, or any details whatsoever.
